Package com.groundcontrol.game.view.ScreenModules

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Section
    Interface used to define the several sections of our game, during it's life cycle
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectClientSection
    Section responsible for client (second player) connection view
    ConnectServerSection
    Section responsible for server (first player) connection view
    GameOverFirstSection
    Section responsible for multiplayer first player game over
    GameOverSecondSection
    Section responsible for multiplayer second player game over
    GameOverSection
    Section responsible for single player game over view
    GameSection
    Section responsible for single player game and main components for multiplayer
    LostConnectionSection
    Section responsible for lost connection view
    MenuSection
    Section responsible for menu view
    MultiplayerClientSection
    Section responsible for multiplayer second player game
    MultiplayerSectionSelector
    Section responsible for player selection
    MultiplayerServerSection
    Section responsible for multiplayer first player game
    PauseFirstSection
    Section responsible for multiplayer first player pause view
    PauseSecondSection
    Section responsible for multiplayer second player pause view
    PauseSection
    Section responsible for single player pause view
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameSection.StateInput
